zh.components.HomePage.239829-1: 第三方平台接口请求基于数据签名调用方式，使用签名来校验客户端请求的完整性以及合法性，您可以参看如下文档，来构造
zh.components.HomePage.239829-2: HTTP 接口以调用对应的第三方平台接口 。
zh.components.HomePage.239829-4: 1. 签名方式,支持MD5和Sha256两种方式.
zh.components.HomePage.239829-5: 2. 发起请求的签名信息都需要放到请求头中,而不是请求体.
zh.components.HomePage.239829-7: 注意：签名时间戳与服务器时间不能相差五分钟以上，否则服务器将拒绝本次请求
zh.components.HomePage.239829-8: 将参数key按ascii排序得到: pageIndex=0&pageSize=20
zh.components.HomePage.239829-9: 使用拼接时间戳以及密钥得到:
zh.components.HomePage.239829-18: 使用和签名相同的算法
zh.components.HomePage.239829-19: 不需要对响应结果排序
zh.components.HomePage.239829-21: JetLinks平台java SDK基于java 8版本开发。
zh.components.HomePage.239829-23: 将以下Maven依赖加入到pom.xml文件中
zh.components.HomePage.239829-24: SDK 客户端的初始化和请求方式

en.components.HomePage.239829-1: The third-party platform interface request is based on data signature calling method, which uses signatures to verify the integrity and legality of client requests. You can refer to the following document to construct it
en.components.HomePage.239829-2: HTTP interface is used to call the corresponding third-party platform interface.
en.components.HomePage.239829-4: 1. Signature method, supports MD5 and Sha256
en.components.HomePage.239829-5: 2. The signature information that initiates the request needs to be placed in the request header, not the request body
en.components.HomePage.239829-7: Attention: The signature timestamp cannot differ from the server time by more than five minutes, otherwise the server will reject this request
en.components.HomePage.239829-8: Sort the parameter keys in ASCII to obtain: pageIndex=0&pageSize=20
en.components.HomePage.239829-9: Using concatenated timestamps and keys to obtain:
en.components.HomePage.239829-18: Use the same algorithm as the signature
en.components.HomePage.239829-19: No need to sort the response results
en.components.HomePage.239829-21: The JetLinks platform Java SDK is developed based on Java 8 version.
